column2: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
KeyPair name from 1 to 255 ASCII characters.
The version number of Elasticsearch used throughout the application

[{u'ToPort': u'9200', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'0.0.0.0/0', u'FromPort': u'9200'}, {u'ToPort': u'9300', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'0.0.0.0/0', u'FromPort': u'9300'}, {u'ToPort': u'22', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': {u'Ref': u'SSHLocation'}, u'FromPort': u'22'}]
The number of Elasticsearch instances to launch in the Auto Scaling group

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash
', u'yum update -y aws-cfn-bootstrap
', u'# Helper function
', u'function error_exit
', u'{
', u'  /opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 1 -r "$1" '', {u'Ref': u'WaitHandle'}, u"'
", u'  exit 1
', u'}
', u'# Install application
', u'#/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -s ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackId'}, u' -r ElasticsearchServer ', u'#    --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'
', u'#get and unzip elasticsearch
', u'wget https://download.elasticsearch.org/elasticsearch/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-', {u'Ref': u'ElasticsearchVersion'}, u'.zip || error_exit "Failed to retrieve elasticsearch archive"
', u'unzip elasticsearch-', {u'Ref': u'ElasticsearchVersion'}, u'.zip -d /usr/local/elasticsearch
', u'#install aws plugin
', u'cd /usr/local/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-', {u'Ref': u'ElasticsearchVersion'}, u'
', u'res=$(bin/plugin -install org.elasticsearch/elasticsearch-cloud-aws/', {u'Fn::FindInMap': [u'ElasticsearchVersion2AWSCloudPluginVersion', {u'Ref': u'ElasticsearchVersion'}, u'Ver']}, u')
', u'if [ "$?" -ne "0" ]; then
', u'   error_exit "Failed to install aws plugin: ${res}"
', u'fi
', u'# Install elasticsearch config.yml
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -s ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackId'}, u' -r ElasticsearchServer ', u'    --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'|| error_exit "failed to run cfn-init"
', u'#install elasticsearch servicewrapper daemon
', u'cd ~
', u'wget https://github.com/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-servicewrapper/zipball/', {u'Fn::FindInMap': [u'ElasticsearchVersion2ServiceWrapperHash', {u'Ref': u'ElasticsearchVersion'}, u'Hash']}, u'
', u'unzip ', {u'Fn::FindInMap': [u'ElasticsearchVersion2ServiceWrapperHash', {u'Ref': u'ElasticsearchVersion'}, u'Hash']}, u'
', u'mv elasticsearch-elasticsearch-servicewrapper-', {u'Fn::FindInMap': [u'ElasticsearchVersion2ServiceWrapperHash', {u'Ref': u'ElasticsearchVersion'}, u'Hash']}, u'/service/ /usr/local/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-', {u'Ref': u'ElasticsearchVersion'}, u'/bin/
', u'cd /usr/local/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-', {u'Ref': u'ElasticsearchVersion'}, u'
', u"sed -i 's#set.default.ES_HOME=.*#set.default.ES_HOME='$PWD'#g' bin/service/elasticsearch.conf
", u'#changing default heap size for smaller instances
', u"sed -i 's#set.default.ES_HEAP_SIZE=.*#set.default.ES_HEAP_SIZE=512#g' bin/service/elasticsearch.conf
", u'bin/service/elasticsearch64 install || error_exit "Failed install elasticsearch daemon"
', u'res=$(bin/service/elasticsearch64 start)
', u'if [ "$?" -ne "0" ]; then
', u'   error_exit "Failed to start elasticsearch servicewrapper: ${res}"
', u'fi
', u'# All is well so signal success
', u"/opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e $? '", {u'Ref': u'WaitHandle'}, u"'
"]]}}

{u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'echo "', u'cloud.aws.region:
', u' ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'
', u'discovery:
', u' type: ec2
', u'
', u'discovery.ec2.groups: ', {u'Ref': u'ElasticsearchSecurityGroup'}, u'
', u'discovery.ec2.tag.type: elasticsearch
', u'
', u'cloud.node.auto_attributes: true
', u' " > ', u'/usr/local/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-', {u'Ref': u'ElasticsearchVersion'}, u'/config/elasticsearch.yml']]}
The name of an existing key pair to enable SSH access to Amazon EC2 instances
Must be a supported version number.
The range of IP addresses with access to SSH into the instances
